name: Freshmarketer
author: integrations@freshmarketer.com

sections.description: Freshmarketer is an all-in-one conversion rate optimization platform. Freshmarketer is an easier way for to improve your website through A/B testing. Create an experiment in minutes with our easy-to-use visual interface with absolutely no coding or engineering required. Convert your website visitors into customers and earn more revenue today!
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

How to install?

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: This plugin connects with Freshmarketer, a simple and powerful tool to optimize your Wordpress site using A/B testing, heatmaps and other optimization …
